01785 class Camera {
01786   public:
01787     enum CameraMsg {
01788          CAMERA_MSG_ERROR = 0x001,

01790          CAMERA_MSG_FOCUS = 0x004,
01791          CAMERA_MSG_ZOOM = 0x008,
01792          CAMERA_MSG_PREVIEW_FRAME = 0x010,
01793          CAMERA_MSG_VIDEO_FRAME = 0x020,
01794          CAMERA_MSG_POSTVIEW_FRAME = 0x040,
01795          CAMERA_MSG_RAW_IMAGE = 0x080,
01796          CAMERA_MSG_COMPRESSED_IMAGE = 0x100,
01797          CAMERA_MSG_RAW_IMAGE_NOTIFY = 0x200,
01798          CAMERA_MSG_PREVIEW_METADATA = 0x400,
01799          CAMERA_MSG_ALL_MSGS = 0x4FF,
01800          CAMERA_MSG_FOCUS_MOVE = 0x800
01801     };
